##
```{r}
install.packages("XML")
library("XML")
install.packages("httr")
library("httr")

fileURL <- "https://www.york.ac.uk/teaching/cws/wws/webpage1.html"
httpReq <- GET(fileURL)
content <- content(httpReq, as = "text")
parsedHTML <- htmlParse(content, asText = TRUE)

df <- xmlToDataFrame(parsedHTML)
```
